amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Federal agencies should ensure that all applicable environmental reviews, approvals, licensing, and permit requirements under Federal law are completed on an expeditious basis after a disaster or emergency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1816 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 20. Record Vote Number: 46.

action.text: Amendment SA 1816 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1761. (consideration: CR S1647-1648, S1649-1650; text: CR S1647) To express the sense of the Senate that Federal agencies should ensure that all applicable environmental reviews, approvals, licensing, and permit requirements under Federal law are completed on an expeditious basis after a disaster or emergency.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1816 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 20. Record Vote Number: 46.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1816 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 20. Record Vote Number: 46.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1816 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1761.
